enable_smooth_stop.description: flag to enable transition to STOPPING

enable_overshoot_emergency.description: flag to enable transition to EMERGENCY when the ego is over the stop line with a certain distance. See `emergency_state_overshoot_stop_dist`

enable_large_tracking_error_emergency.description: flag to enable transition to EMERGENCY when the closest trajectory point search is failed due to a large deviation between trajectory and ego pose

enable_slope_compensation.description: flag to modify output acceleration for slope compensation. The source of the slope angle can be selected from ego-pose or trajectory angle

enable_keep_stopped_until_steer_converge.description: flag to keep stopped condition until until the steer converges

drive_state_stop_dist.description: The state will transit to DRIVE when the distance to the stop point is longer than `drive_state_stop_dist` + `drive_state_offset_stop_dist` [m]

drive_state_offset_stop_dist.description: The state will transit to DRIVE when the distance to the stop point is longer than `drive_state_stop_dist` + `drive_state_offset_stop_dist` [m]

stopping_state_stop_dist.description: The state will transit to STOPPING when the distance to the stop point is shorter than `stopping_state_stop_dist` [m]

stopped_state_entry_duration_time.description: threshold of the ego velocity in transition to the STOPPED state [s]

stopped_state_entry_vel.description: threshold of the ego velocity in transition to the STOPPED state [m/s]

stopped_state_entry_acc.description: threshold of the ego acceleration in transition to the STOPPED state [m/s^2]

emergency_state_overshoot_stop_dist.description: If `enable_overshoot_emergency` is true and the ego is `emergency_state_overshoot_stop_dist`-meter ahead of the stop point, the state will transit to EMERGENCY. [m]

emergency_state_traj_trans_dev.description: If the ego's position is `emergency_state_traj_trans_dev` meter away from the nearest trajectory point, the state will transit to EMERGENCY. [m]

emergency_state_traj_rot_dev.description: If the ego's orientation is `emergency_state_traj_rot_dev` rad away from the nearest trajectory point orientation, the state will transit to EMERGENCY. [rad]

max_out.description: max value of PID's output acceleration during DRIVE state [m/s^2]

min_out.description: min value of PID's output acceleration during DRIVE state [m/s^2]

max_p_effort.description: max value of acceleration with p gain

min_p_effort.description: min value of acceleration with p gain

max_i_effort.description: max value of acceleration with i gain

min_i_effort.description: min value of acceleration with i gain

max_d_effort.description: max value of acceleration with d gain

min_d_effort.description: min value of acceleration with d gain

lpf_vel_error_gain.description: gain of low-pass filter for velocity

enable_integration_at_low_speed.description: Whether to enable integration of acceleration errors when the vehicle speed is lower than `current_vel_threshold_pid_integration` or not.

current_vel_threshold_pid_integration.description: Velocity error is integrated for I-term only when the absolute value of current velocity is larger than this parameter. [m/s]

time_threshold_before_pid_integration.description: How much time without the vehicle moving must past to enable PID error integration. [s]

enable_brake_keeping_before_stop.description: flag to keep a certain acceleration during DRIVE state before the ego stops. See [Brake keeping]

brake_keeping_acc.description: If `enable_brake_keeping_before_stop` is true, a certain acceleration is kept during DRIVE state before the ego stops [m/s^2] See [Brake keeping]

smooth_stop_weak_stop_acc.description: weak acceleration to stop right now [m/s^2]

smooth_stop_strong_stop_acc.description: strong acceleration to be output when the ego is `smooth_stop_strong_stop_dist`-meter over the stop point. [m/s^2]

smooth_stop_max_fast_vel.description: max fast vel to judge the ego is running fast [m/s]. If the ego is running fast, strong acceleration will be output.

smooth_stop_min_running_vel.description: min ego velocity to judge if the ego is running or not [m/s]

smooth_stop_min_running_acc.description: min ego acceleration to judge if the ego is running or not [m/s^2]

smooth_stop_weak_stop_time.description: max time to output weak acceleration [s]. After this, strong acceleration will be output.

smooth_stop_weak_stop_dist.description: Weak acceleration will be output when the ego is `smooth_stop_weak_stop_dist`-meter before the stop point. [m]

smooth_stop_strong_stop_dist.description: Strong acceleration will be output when the ego is `smooth_stop_strong_stop_dist`-meter over the stop point. [m]

emergency_acc.description: target acceleration in an EMERGENCY state [m/s^2]

emergency_jerk.description: target jerk in an EMERGENCY state [m/s^3]

lpf_acc_error_gain.description: gain of low-pass filter for acceleration

max_jerk.description: max value of jerk of output acceleration [m/s^3]

min_jerk.description: min value of jerk of output acceleration [m/s^3]

max_acc_cmd_diff.description: max difference between the current and previous acceleration command [m/s^2 * s^-1]

lpf_pitch_gain.description: gain of low-pass filter for pitch estimation

adaptive_trajectory_velocity_th.description: threshold of the ego velocity to use adaptive trajectory velocity [m/s]
